Tip of the Month

Go Pro - Get CLE Webinar Access & Justia Chat

When you upgrade to Justia Connect Pro, you unlock access to exclusive Justia Webinars with CLE credit available for select live and on-demand programs. This is one of the many benefits of Justia Connect Pro. We recently added Justia Chat for Justia Connect Pro members as well. Having Justia Chat on your Justia Lawyer Directory Profile can boost your chances of getting even more potential clients from your enhanced profile!

From the Desk of Justia

Justia Legal Resources: Adoption Law Center

Expanding your family through adoption is exciting but can be daunting. Adoptive parents likely want to ensure that the process goes as smoothly as possible. The Adoption Law Center at Justia provides some general insights.

Chris Skelton | September 24, 2024

Shackled to Our Screens: How Technology Has Imprisoned the Legal Profession

When you think about how you spend your time nowadays, what do you imagine? Eight hours a day, five days a week where you are looking at a screen for just about the whole time? But what about the hours after? Are you sitting in front of a TV or computer when you are home and during the weekends? Are we, in essence, simply perpetually shackled to our screens?

Justia Team | September 12, 2024

Meet Our Team

We celebrated 15 years of our Justia Mexico office this summer. Starting with a small office and a team of enthusiastic software engineers, we’ve experienced rapid growth year after year and have expanded our office several times. Today, our team comprises a diverse group of professionals in software engineering, graphic design, customer service, marketing, law, and more. Here's to many more years to come!

A Pug’s Tale

The Hug Pugs want to make sure your peeps are registered and have a plan to vote! Check with friends and family to make sure they are registered and have a plan too. Your vote matters!
